body_html: @byronyi well, this slowness within a single machine, so the bottleneck must software related. My suspicion is that RecvTensor involves a single-threaded memcpy somewhere, this would explain 75% of the slowness -- I see 105ms, while 100 MB at 1.25 GBps memcpy speed = 80ms
